content.description:
Data for the graph is based on the National Survey on Drug Use and Health. Prevalence rates include individuals diagnosable or diagnosed within the past year, meeting the specified duration criteria outlined in the DSM.

Past Year Prevalence of Serious Mental Illness Amount U.S. Adults (2021)
content.question: To ensure that a survey properly accounts for the prevalence of serious mental illness (SMI) in underrepresented groups, which of the following methodological processes should the researchers follow?

choices.label: Debriefing participants when the study is over

skill.text: 2.B: Evaluate the appropriate use of research design elements in experimental methodology.
